join.description: Joins the voice channel you are in.
join.alreadyIn: I'm already in your voice channel!

leave.description: Make me leave the voice channel I'm in.
leave.notConnected: I'm not connected to a voice channel!

loop.description: Toggle looping the current song or the whole queue

query.description: Search for a video name or provide a link.

type.description: The type of search results you want.

safe_search.description: Whether or not use safe search (YouTube restricted mode).

skip.description: Skip the current song to play your's directly.

shuffle.description: Shuffles the queue after adding the song(s)

amount.description: how much songs do you want to skip? You can use negative numbers to go to a previous song.

stop.description: Stop the player and clear the queue.
stop.success: I stopped the player and cleared the queue.

volume.success: The volume has been set to {volume}%.
